issues.fullMessage: To check the type of an object there are several options: "is", "IsInstanceOfType" or "IsAssignableFrom". Depending on whether the type is returned by a "GetType()" or "typeof()" call, the "IsAssignableFrom()" and "IsInstanceOfType()" might be simplified. Simplifying the calls make "null" checking unnecessary because both "is" and "IsInstanceOfType" performs it already.

properties.title: Runtime type checking should be simplified
